title: $ASO Academy Sports and Outdoors Q4 2024 Earnings Conference Call

Sports and Outdoors fourth quarter

following the prepared remarks there
will be a question and answer session

our consistent operational execution in

in 2024 we strategically invested an

this year first new source our plan is

we'll also start seeing several of the
